seo.title: Process
seo.description: From discovery to install—clear steps, zero chaos.

heading: Our Process
intro: From discovery to install—clear steps, zero chaos.

steps.title: Discovery
steps.body: We learn your routines, constraints, and goals.

steps.title: Design
steps.body: Layouts, materials, and lighting come together.

steps.title: Delivery
steps.body: Procurement, coordination, and install to the last detail.

overview.heading: From idea to lived-in comfort
overview.body: We combine classic design principles with your day-to-day realities—circulation, storage, light, and the tactile details that make a room feel like home.

highlights.title: Clarity at each step
highlights.text: You’ll know what’s next and why it matters.

highlights.title: Timeless over trendy
highlights.text: Materials and forms that age gracefully.

case.title: A kitchen that invites gathering
case.body: In this compact home, we widened the circulation, introduced warm woods, and layered lighting to shift the mood from “task only” to “linger here.” Existing heirloom pieces were integrated to keep the space personal.
keyMoves: Storage strategies that keep counters clear

cards.title: Decisions made simple
cards.body: Clear options with pros/cons, pricing, and visuals—no guesswork.

cards.title: Steady communication
cards.body: Weekly updates, milestone check-ins, and a single source of truth.

cards.title: Respect for your time
cards.body: Site visits are purposeful; presentations are concise and actionable.

cards.title: A polished reveal
cards.body: White-glove installation and final styling for that “ahh” moment.
